TelemetryActnDefStepAttr.name: TelemetryActnDefStepAttr
TelemetryActnDefStepAttr.description: Represents the attributes of a telemetry action definition step.

AllowedValues.description: The allowed values for the telemetry action definition step attribute.

TelemetryActnDefStepId.description: The telemetry action definition step that this attribute belongs to.

UnitOfMeasure.description: The unit of measure of the telemetry action definition step attribute.
